summary: The 'Protecting our Guests During Hostilities in Ukraine Act' proposes temporary Ukrainian guest status for eligible aliens, specifically those paroled under the 'Uniting for Ukraine' process from April 21, 2022. This status grants employment authorization and lasts until 120 days after the Secretary of State determines hostilities have ceased and safe return to Ukraine is possible.  The bill also allows for revocation of the status under specific circumstances outlined in the Immigration and Nationality Act.
